enriched_profile.summary: Customer Service Associate with a focus on floral design, dedicated to providing excellent customer service. Skilled in inventory control, employee scheduling, cash handling, and banking.

experience.description: Managed store operations, including opening and closing, cash handling, and banking. Maintained visually appealing and effective displays. Assisted customers in selecting products and designing floral arrangements.
Performed cashier duties, unloaded trucks, stocked shelves, and carried merchandise. Marked clearance products with updated price tags.
Handled opening and closing of the store, cash handling, and banking. Assisted customers in selecting products and performed floral designing.
Designed arrangements for various events, maintained showroom cleanliness, and prepared materials.
